attributes.additional_details:
Yet another cover up by Police and council staff at Rotherham.
We the British public are being conned and lied to by Government.
1400 CHILDREN RAPED AND ABUSED WITH THE KNOWLEDGE OF COUNCIL LEADERS AND POLICE.
THEY WERE TOO SCARED BECAUSE THE CULPRITS ARE MUSLIM. AND IT MIGHT SEEM RACIST. ABSOLUTE GARBAGE. MANY ARE INVOLVED IN PAEDOPHILIA AND COVERING THEIR OWN BACKSIDES.
THIS PETITION IS FOR THE REMOVAL FROM OFFICE OF ALL INVOLVED AND CRIMINAL CHARGES BROUGHT.
THE GOVERNMENT ALONG WITH THE POLICE ARE IMPLICATED IN MANY INCIDENTS BUT WE ARE NOT AWARE BECAUSE THE MEDIA IS CONTROLLED BY GOVERNMENTS FRIENDS.
1400 KIDS ABUSED AND NOTHING WAS DONE. WE KNOW MANY LABOUR COUNCILLORS AND MPS HAVE BEEN CHARGED BUT KEPT OUT OF THE MEDIA.
JACK STRAWS BROTHER FOR ONE.
GO TO LABOUR 25.COM AND SEE FOR YOURSELF HOW ENDEMIC THE PROBLEM IS .
WE WANT CRIMINAL ACTION TAKEN AGAINST THE MUSLIMS WHO DID THIS AND THE COPS AND OFFICIALS WHO COVERED IT UP.

rejection.details: The investigation of alleged crime is an operational policing matter.
